RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 43000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FIVE RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN CLAIMING SINCE JANUARY 20, 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $62,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Claiming races for $35,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference byco ndition eligibility). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KATHAAN saved ground while being unhurried, angled out nearing the stretch to be five-wide and was up with a rush in the final sixteenth. SHE CAN'T SING was reserved of the early pace, moved up along the inside nearing the quarter pole, angled out during the drive, caught CAT ATTACK to gain the lead inside the eighth pole, but was unable to resist KATHAAN late. CAT ATTACK saved ground setting the pace to the eighth pole but was unable to stay with the top two late. WAVE OF GOODNESS chased the pace while racing two-wide but lacked a rally. OMIXOCHITL was off a step slow, moved up three-wide on the turn but was unable to seriously threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Kathaan
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, 5-wide entering, finished fast, up final 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: She Can't Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, inside move 1/4, angled out, led, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Omixochitl
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, 3-wide turn, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 87. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 22000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $7,500 OR LESS IN 2021 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming races for $10,000 or less not considered in allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIANNA'S GIFT stalked the pace while racing two-wide, moved up to engage FREE LOVE entering the stretch, gained the lead inside the eighth pole and quickly drew clear. FREE LOVE saved ground setting the pace to the eighth pole, was unable to match strides with the winner but held on well for the place. LUCY'S LOOKIN LEFT was reserved off the pace while racing two-wide, responded when asked and closed strongly. EMITYAAZ was allowed to settle while racing three-wide but lacked a rally. RONAN was unhurried early, swung out to come four-wide into the stretch but lacked a late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Gianna's Gift
ENTRY.OWNER: Contreras Stable Inc and Knapczyk Andrew

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Lyster Thoroughbred Company, LLC,Jack Moore & Mike Moore

ENTRY.NAME: Free Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, saved ground, no match, held 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 20, 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claimi ng Price $6,250 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUGER set the pace racing in hand while slightly removed from the rail, responded when asked and maintained a safe advantage. MARIA'S GIFT was allowed to settle while racing three-wide, offered a bid entering the stretch, could not reach the winner but finished well for second in a steady effort. GHAALEB'S DREAMS acted up in the gate prior to the stretch, then was reserved off the pace while racing four-wide and finished in a mild rally. ZENCHUA SKY was five-wide for the first half mile while racing with the field, then dropped back slightly and weakened. C C'S WORLD saved ground chasing the winner into the stretch and tired late.

ENTRY.NAME: Couger
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, in hand, maintained safe advantage

ENTRY.NAME: Ghaaleb's Dreams
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: acted up gate, reserved, 4-wide, mild rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 5 1/2F Turf CR: 84. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 39000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $62,500. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6 2,500 (Claiming races for $40,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARS ON FIRE (IRE) saved ground setting the pace and maintained a safe advantage. NO KAY NEVER (IRE) was allowed to settle, steadied nearing the three-sixteenths pole while in tight from between horses, angled out to come four-wide into the stretch and finished fast when clear. CAT ROYALE was off a step slow then unhurried, moved up between horses on the turn, came three-wide into the stretch and closed strongly. SECRET OPERATION was reserved off the pace, came four-wide into the stretch and finished in a mild rally. LURE'EM IN was reserved off the pace while racing three-wide but lacked a rally. WILMA MANKILLER steadied from along the inside nearing the half mile pole, then dropped back and saved ground. was in tight nearing the eighth pole along the inside and finished willingly when clear. SUNSET PAYNTER prompted the issue for three furlongs while racing two-wide and gave way. SWEET NELLIE vied for the lead to the stretch while racing three-wide and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Cat Royale
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, unhurried, 3-wide entering, closed strongly

ENTRY.NAME: Stars On Fire (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, saved ground, maintained advantage

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: The Out Of The Flames Partnership

ENTRY.NAME: Wilma Mankiller
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied 1/2, dropped back, in tight 1/8, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: No Kay Never (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, steadied 3/16, angled out 4-wide, finished fast

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Nellie
ENTRY.OWNER: Kane Mark E and Rosin Coty W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR ILLINOIS REGISTERED, CONCEIVED AND/OR FOALED. Maidens, Fillies And Mares Three Years Old and Upward. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVEYOULIKECRAZY set the pace in hand while racing removed from the rail and won without need of urging. FREEDOM ATTACK chased the winner throughout, was no match for that one but was clear second best. FEATURED POWER was unhurried early while racing four-wide, was carried further out during the drive but LADY WHITE SOX and finished willingly. LADY WHITE SOX was allowed to settle while racing three-wide, drifted out during the drive and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady White Sox
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 3-wide, drifted out drive, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Loveyoulikecrazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace in hand, off rail, handily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 5 1/2F Turf CR: 82. Allowance Purse 39000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 20 A llowed 2 lbs. (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MADELYN BELLE was bumped at the start by BELPERRON, then was forwardly placed while three-wide, came four-wide into the stretch and closed strongly to prevail narrowly in a stiff drive. BELPERRON broke out to bump with the winner, then prompted the issue while racing two-wide, took the lead nearing the eighth pole, responded when challenged and held on gamely to the wire for second. RARE ACTION ATTACK saved ground while being unhurried, slipped through during the drive and finished fast to just miss. TAR HEEL GIRL was reserved off the pace, came three-wide into the stretch, angled in nearing the eighth pole. split rivals and appeared to gain a slight lead inside the sixteenth pole before shying away from BELPERRON nearing the wire and finished willingly to lose a tough decision. GOOD MONGOLIA was allowed to settle, came two-wide into the stretch, was briefly in tight nearing the eighth pole when TAR HEEL GIRL came in and finished willingly when clear. PEACH COBBLER was three-wide on the turn while being reserved off the pace, came five-wide into the stretch but lacked a rally. HEAVENLY SCENT vied for the lead into the stretch while racing removed from the rail, was briefly in tight nearing the eighth pole while tiring.

ENTRY.NAME: Belperron
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, prompted 2-wide, responded, held gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Madelyn Belle
ENTRY.OWNER: Catalano Thoroughbreds Inc and LAZ Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, forwardly placed 3-w, 4-w entering, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Tar Heel Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 3-wide entering, angled in, shied late, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Heavenly Scent
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, off rail, in tight 1/8, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 39000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $62,500. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Cl aiming races for $40,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOOKIN FOR BALA dueled for the lead with ONASA, shook that one off nearing the eighth pole and gradually increased his advantage late. ONASA dueled for the lead from along the outside into the stretch, could not stay with the winner late but held on well for the place. STAR NATION saved ground while being unhurried, angled out four-wide nearing the eighth pole and finished full of run. CORTESE saved ground stalking the pace, moved up three-wide to offer his bid nearing the quarter pole and then flattened out. SILVER CHILLER was reserved off the pace, came four-wide into the stretch but failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Star Nation
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, saved ground, angled out 1/8, full of run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 8 7 1/2F Turf CR: 90. Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming races for $8,500 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLY NIGHTLY was reserved off the pace while racing three-wide on the turn, came five-wide into the stretch and was up with a rush in the final seventy yards. CLEAR N CONVINCING saved ground early while being allowed to settle, angled out to be four-wide entering the stretch and finished fast while racing without a left fron shoe. VITALE was forwardly placed while racing two-wide, angled out to be three-wide nearing the eighth pole and closed strongly from between horses. SON OF GRACE dropped back early, rallied six-wide into the stretch and finished full of run. OVERTHOUGHT saved ground setting the pace and held on determinedly during the drive. EXPROMPT (FR) prompted the issue from along the outside and held on fairly well during the drive in a steady effort. DYNABLUE steadied shortly after the start when in tight from between horses, then saved ground and failed to threaten. ANDTHETHUNDERROLLS saved ground while being allowed to settle and failed to seriously threaten. BLURT was three-wide early while racing in the middle of the field to near the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Overthought
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, saved ground, determined try

ENTRY.NAME: Vitale
ENTRY.OWNER: Reavis, Michael L. and Fraterrigo, Gregory J.
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 2-wide, angled out 3-w 1/8, closed strongly

ENTRY.NAME: Dynablue
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied early, saved ground, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Son of Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, 6-wide entering, full of run

ENTRY.NAME: Clear N Convincing
ENTRY.OWNER: Down The Stretch Racing Stables, Inc. (Larry Rivelli)
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, angled out 4-wide entering, finished fast

ENTRY.NAME: Fly Nightly
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 3-wide turn, 5-wide entering, up late rush
